sense.gloss: insertion, incorporation, infixing
illustration (in a book, newspaper, etc.), picture
to hold between (e.g. one's fingers, chopsticks), to grip (from both sides)
to put between, to sandwich between, to insert, to interpose
to catch (e.g. a finger in a door), to trap, to pinch
to insert (e.g. a break into proceedings), to interpose (e.g. an objection), to interject, to throw in (e.g. a joke)
to be on either side of (a road, table, etc.), to have between each other, to be across (a street, river, etc.)
to harbour (feelings), to cast (e.g. doubt)
teapot-like object made typically of lacquerware and used to pour hot and cold liquids
basin of water with two handles on either side used for washing one's face or hands
illustration
episode, side story, story within a story, aside, anecdote
cutting, planting (a cutting)
to insert, to put in
to plant (a cutting), to strike
to arrange (flowers)
to wear (a sword) in one's belt
to shut, to close, to lock, to fasten
insert mode
inserted figure

sdata.j: その↑作家↑↓さっか↓の↑文体↑↓ぶんたい↓は↑挿入↑↓そうにゅう↓↑語句↑↓ごく↓が↑多↑↓おお↓い。
sdata.e: The writer has a parenthetic style.

sdata.j: この↑本↑↓ほん↓は↑挿絵↑↓さしえ↓を↑除↑↓のぞ↓いて２５２ページある。
sdata.e: This book has 252 pages exclusive of illustrations.

sdata.j: この↑本↑↓ほん↓には↑美↑↓うつく↓しい↑挿絵↑↓さしえ↓が↑入↑↓はい↓っている。
このままでは↑熾烈↑↓しれつ↓な↑情報↑↓じょうほう↓↑戦↑↓せん↓に↑勝↑↓か↓てない。ＣＩＯの↑首↑↓くび↓を↑挿↑↓す↓げ↑替↑↓か↓えよう。
sdata.e: This is a bruising information war. At this rate we'll never come out on top. We've got to replace our CIO.

sdata.j: このページの↑上↑↓じょう↓に↑挿↑↓さ↓し↑絵↑↓え↓が↑有↑↓あ↓ります。
sdata.e: Here's an illustration at the top of this page.

sdata.j: ↑著者↑↓ちょしゃ↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑本↑↓ほん↓に↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑挿↑↓さ↓し↑絵↑↓え↓を↑入↑↓い↓れた。
sdata.e: The author illustrated his book with a lot of pictures.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はボタンの↑穴↑↓あな↓に↑花↑↓はな↓を↑挿↑↓さ↓した。
sdata.e: He stuck a flower in his buttonhole.

sdata.j: ↑実↑↓み↓も↑結↑↓むす↓ぶが、↑挿↑↓さ↓し↑木↑↓き↓でも↑根付↑↓ねつ↓くらしい？
sdata.e: It bears fruit, but it seems it may even set root from cuttings?

sdata.j: この↑本↑↓ほん↓は↑挿絵↑↓さしえ↓を↑除↑↓のぞ↓いて２５２ページある。
sdata.e: This book has 252 pages, excluding illustrations.
